    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [object]                                1         8
    [Main]                                  8         13
    [{]                                     13        15
L2
    [def]                                   2         6
    [main]                                  6         11
    [(]                                     10        12
    [args]                                  11        16
    [:]                                     15        17
    [Array]                                 17        23
    [\[]                                    22        24
    [String]                                23        30
    [\]]                                    29        31
    [)]                                     30        32
    [:]                                     31        33
    [Unit]                                  33        38
    [=]                                     38        40
    [{]                                     40        42
L3
    [println]                               3         11
    [(]                                     10        12
    ["Hello, World!"]                       11        27
    [)]                                     26        28
L4
    [}]                                     2         4
L5
    [}]                                     1         3
EOF
